projects.name: University App (Salesforce CRM)
projects.description:
Data Model, Objects, Formula Fields, Validation Rules, Page Layout, Record Types
Streamlined Data Management: Created custom objects and data models for efficient student and course tracking.
Automated Academic Processes: Implemented formula fields and validation rules to minimize grading errors.
Tailored User Experience: Designed page layouts and record types for role-specific views.

projects.name: Recruitment App
projects.description:
Object Relationships, Lookup, Master-Detail, Reports and Dashboards, Lightning Experience
Optimized Candidate Tracking: Built object relationships to link candidates, job postings, and interview schedules.
Data-Driven Insights: Crafted reports and dashboards for real-time recruitment analytics.
Enhanced Interface: Leveraged Lightning Experience for a user-friendly recruiter portal.

projects.name: OLXmuj Website
projects.description:
HTML, CSS, Javascript, PHP, MySQL
Developed a customized online marketplace for the MUJ community, integrating user authentication and product listings to streamline the exchange of goods.
Boosted community participation by 30% through a responsive and user-friendly platform, fostering active engagement within the university.
Enhanced overall site usability by optimizing for both mobile and desktop environments, resulting in a 25% increase in user retention.

projects.name: GymLog Website

HTML, CSS, Javascript

Fostered fitness tracking and accountability within the university.
